file_content.text: Welcome to the Alderaan battle simulation. This is a clean, live-fire competition--no shenanigans on my watch.
Initiating wargame simulation four-nine kresh, Alderaan scenario. It is my pleasure to oversee this exercise.
You've seized the artillery! Firing on Shadow Squad.
Blazer Squad takes the artillery. Good work.
Artillery firing on your ship, Blazer Squad.
Shadow Squad is firing on you! Don't give them the satisfaction.
The deployment vehicles are ready. Strap in.
Turret locked. Firing on enemy ship.
The deployment vehicles are ready. Take them to the battlefield.
Artillery is firing on your ship!
You have been divided into two teams. Blazer Squad and Striker Squad will face off for control of the planetary cannon facility.
Note the three air-defense artillery turrets on the ground. Slice each turret's targeting console to take the weapon.
Use the turrets to neutralize the enemy dropship. Destroy their vessel, and you win the simulation!
Combatants are divided into two teams: Reaper Squad and Shadow Squad. Each will fight for control of the planetary cannon facility.
The battlefield contains three air-defense artillery turrets. Slice each turret's targeting console to harness the gun's firepower.
Direct those turrets at the opposing squad's dropship. Annihilate the enemy vessel, and win the wargame!
Shadow Squad! Artillery has locked on your ship!
You've taken the artillery. Well done, Shadow Squad.
Artillery has locked on your ship, Striker Squad.
The artillery is yours, Striker Squad.
You're taking fire! Reclaim that turret.
Turret firing on Reaper Squad's ship. Well done.
The turret is yours. Firing on Striker Squad's vessel.
The enemy's firing on you. Striker Squad, take that turret.
Blazer Squad, you're taking fire.
Turret locked on the enemy's ship. Firing.
Gun battery locked and firing! Fantastic, Reaper Squad.
Enemy has seized the gun battery.
Gun battery firing. Good show, Shadow Squad!
Enemy takes the gun battery. Watch out, Reaper Squad!
Gun battery firing. Advantage to you, Blazer Squad.
Warning, Striker Squad. Gun battery under enemy control.
The enemy commands the gun battery.
Gun battery won. Advantage to you, Striker Squad.
Enemy vessel taking fire. Keep up your offensive, Blazer Squad.
Striker Squad, your ship is taking heavy fire.
Blazer Squad, your ship has sustained heavy damage.
Strong offensive, Striker Squad. The enemy is taking fire.
Enemy shields are failing. Maintain your assault!
Shields failing, Striker Squad. Recapture the weapons, or your ship will be lost!
Ship damage critical--but don't give up. Retake those enemy weapons!
Keep it up, Striker Squad. The enemy ship won't last long.
Enemy vessel taking damage. Bring them down, Reaper Squad!
Shadow Squad, your ship is taking damage!
Reaper Squad, your ship is taking fire!
Enemy ship damaged. Don't relent!
Continue your onslaught! Shadow Squad's shields are failing.
Your ship is nearly lost. Turn the tide, Shadow Squad. Take back the artillery!
Critical damage sustained! Reaper Squad, take the enemy's artillery!
Reaper Squad's shields are nearly down. Finish them!
Your ship is lost, Blazer Squad. Thankfully, this is just an exercise. Simulation complete.
That's how it's done. Striker Squad has destroyed the enemy ship. Simulation complete.
Well done, Blazer Squad. You've successfully routed the enemy ship. Simulation complete.
Your ship has fallen to the enemy. Striker Squad, prepare for performance review. Simulation complete.
Your ship has been destroyed. Reaper Squad: standby for extraction and debriefing. Wargame complete.
The enemy ship is destroyed! Congratulations Shadow Squad on a glorious victory worthy of the Empire.
The enemy ship burns, and Reaper Squad wins the simulation. A superb wargame.
Shadow Squad, your ship is no more. May the sting of defeat fuel your next victory. Wargame complete.
Alderaan simulation engaged. Make the Republic proud.
Prove your might. May the best squad win!
You are on Striker Squad.
You are on Blazer Squad.
You form Reaper Squad.
You form Shadow Squad.
